card.name: Wood Elves
card.property: When this creature enters, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Icatian Javelineers
card.property: This creature enters with a javelin counter on it. {T}, Remove a javelin counter from this creature: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Fiery Temper
card.property: Fiery Temper deals 3 damage to any target. Madness {R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Boomerang
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Calciderm
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Vanishing 4 (This creature enters with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

card.name: Reckless Wurm
card.property: Trample Madness {2}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Yixlid Jailer
card.property: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.

card.name: Zoetic Cavern
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Llanowar Elves
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Mogg Fanatic
card.property: Sacrifice this creature: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Mind Stone
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

card.name: Dauntless Dourbark
card.property: Dauntless Dourbark's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control plus the number of Treefolk you control. This creature has trample as long as you control another Treefolk.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.property: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Cenn's Tactician
card.property: {W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Soldier creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can block an additional creature each combat.

card.name: Oona's Blackguard
card.property: Flying Each other Rogue creature you control enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When this creature enters, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Boggart Ram-Gang
card.property: Haste Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)

card.name: Wilt-Leaf Cavaliers
card.property: Vigilance

card.name: Duergar Hedge-Mage
card.property: When this creature enters, if you control two or more Mountains, you may destroy target artifact. When this creature enters, if you control two or more Plains, you may destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Selkie Hedge-Mage
card.property: When this creature enters, if you control two or more Forests, you may gain 3 life. When this creature enters, if you control two or more Islands, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sprouting Thrinax
card.property: When this creature dies, create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

card.name: Path to Exile
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Hellspark Elemental
card.property: Trample, haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Marisi's Twinclaws
card.property: Double strike

card.name: Slave of Bolas
card.property: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Mycoid Shepherd
card.property: Whenever this creature or another creature you control with power 5 or greater dies, you may gain 5 life.

card.name: Naya Sojourners
card.property: When you cycle this card and when this creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Mind Control
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Rise from the Grave
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Kor Duelist
card.property: As long as this creature is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Nissa's Chosen
card.property: If this creature would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

card.name: Emeria Angel
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Kor Firewalker
card.property: Protection from red Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Hada Freeblade
card.property: Whenever this creature or another Ally you control enters, you may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Kalastria Highborn
card.property: Whenever this creature or another Vampire you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Syphon Mind
card.property: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.

card.name: Tazeem
card.property: Creatures can't block. Whenever chaos ensues, draw a card for each land you control.

card.name: Celestine Reef
card.property: Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack. Whenever chaos ensues, until a player planeswalks, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

card.name: Horizon Boughs
card.property: All permanents untap during each player's untap step. Whenever chaos ensues, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Mirrored Depths
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If the player loses the flip, counter that spell. Whenever chaos ensues, target player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Tember City
card.property: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Tember City deals 1 damage to that player. Whenever chaos ensues, each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent of their choice.

card.name: Pathrazer of Ulamog
card.property: Annihilator 3 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three permanents of their choice.) This creature can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

card.name: Curse of Wizardry
card.property: As this enchantment enters, choose a color. Whenever a player casts a spell of the chosen color, that player loses 1 life.

card.name: Staggershock
card.property: Staggershock deals 2 damage to any target. Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Deathless Angel
card.property: Flying {W}{W}: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Fling
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

card.name: Sylvan Ranger
card.property: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Liliana's Specter
card.property: Flying When this creature enters, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Mitotic Slime
card.property: When this creature dies, create two 2/2 green Ooze creature tokens. They have "When this token dies, create two 1/1 green Ooze creature tokens."

card.name: Plots That Span Centuries
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, the next time you would set a scheme in motion, set three schemes in motion instead.

card.name: Perhaps You've Met My Cohort
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Your Inescapable Doom
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up.) At the beginning of your end step, put a doom counter on this scheme, then this scheme deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to the opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, you choose one.

card.name: Drench the Soil in Their Blood
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, after this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Imprison This Insolent Wretch
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. Permanents the chosen player controls don't untap during their untap step. When the chosen player is attacked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Plague Stinger
card.property: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Golem's Heart
card.property: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Tempered Steel
card.property: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Skinrender
card.property: When this creature enters, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.

card.name: Master's Call
card.property: Create two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

card.property: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {T}: Add {C}.

card.property: When this creature enters, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.property: When this creature enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Maul Splicer
card.property: When this creature enters, create two 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature tokens. Golem creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Shrine of Burning Rage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep and whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on this artifact. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

card.name: Priest of Urabrask
card.property: When this creature enters, add {R}{R}{R}.

card.name: Myr Superion
card.property: Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast this spell.

card.name: Tormented Soul
card.property: This creature can't block and can't be blocked.

card.name: Auramancer
card.property: When this creature enters, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Circle of Flame
card.property: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, this enchantment deals 1 damage to that creature.

card.name: Stormblood Berserker
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Dungrove Elder
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Dungrove Elder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.
